The video shared on social media shows a: which is claimed to be a public execution by North Korean President Kim Jong-un.
The video was originally tweeted by Gaur: who stated that it depicts the North Korean president giving death punishment to a corrupt officer in the presence of the media.
Alt News: a fact-checking organization, found that the video is an edited version of a 2018 video showing South Korean President Moon Jae-in and Kim Jong-un shaking hands during a meeting at the Inter Korean Summit. The original video does not depict a public execution or the punishment of a corrupt officer.
